text: [Ej ashoʙi pajomʙar] Agar sumo uro jori nakuned, hatman, Alloh taolo jorias namud: hangome ki kofiron uro [az Makka] ʙerun kardand, on goh ki jake az on du, ki dar ƣor [-i Savr panoh girifta] ʙudand, ʙa hamrohi xud [Aʙuʙakr] guft: «Anduhgin maʙos, [ki] ʙe tardid, Alloh taolo ʙo most». Pas, Alloh taolo oromisi xudro ʙar u furu firistod va uro ʙo sipohijone, ki onhoro namedided, ta'jid [-u taqvijat] kard va suxani kasonero, ki kufr varzidand, pasttar gardond. Va suxani Alloh taolost, ki ʙartar ast va Alloh taolo sikastnopaziru hakim ast
